P427417.Description:
Which skin type is it good for?вњ” Normalвњ” Oilyвњ” Combinationвњ” Dryвњ” Sensitive
What it is: A high-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula with 10 percent pure niacinamide and one percent zinc PCA.
Solutions for:- Oiliness- Pores
If you want to know more… Niacinamide (vitamin B3) reduces the appearance of skin blemishes and congestion. A high 10 percent concentration of this vitamin is supported in the formula by zinc PCA to balance visible aspects of sebum activity.
What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates
What else you need to know: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without alcohol, silicone, nuts, gluten, and fragrance.

IncentivizedReview.Label: I received this product as a free sample

P427417.Name: Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%

Results.Title: Love

Results.ReviewText:
This is a must buy product! I just received my second bottle and I know this is a product I will re-purchase again and again. 

After using this product daily for 3 months I can attest that it controls my oily t-zone, fades my red/dark acne spots and prevents further breakouts. 

The first time I used this product I did experience the pilling that other reviews have mentioned. I’ve learned some things along the way that prevent it from happening altogether...

- First step: I mist my face with distilled water and then apply The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid. Then I wait one full minute before moving onto the next step to allow it to fully dry. 
- I mist my face with distilled water again, then immediately apply 2-3 drops of Niacinamide all over my face and neck. I notice that a damp face allows the product to work into the skin more evenly. 
- Then... and this is the most IMPORTANT part... WAIT 5 min before moving onto the next step in your skincare routine. Whether that’s a serum, moisturizer or SPF... make sure to incorporate that wait period to allow the Niacinamide to A.) work alone and B.) completely dry. 

That’s it! No pilling, no problem! 

Bonus: If you’re feeling EXTRA — I keep my Niacinamide in my skincare fridge and while this step is not necessary at all I swear it helps the consistency of the product and the application as well.

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: I received this product as a free sample

Results.Title: Love this Niacinamide! No Pilling, No Problem!

Results.ReviewText: I bought this as a cheaper alternative to the Paula’s choice Niacinamide 10%, the texture is a bit slimy and slightly thicker so it won’t quickly run down your face as you’re applying it. I want to warn anyone who uses the Paula’s choice BHA exfoliating liquid, I experienced pilling when I used those two together, which I did not experience using the Paula’s choice Niacinamide, no matter how long I waited or what order it put on those two products I would always get pilling after applying them. Other than the pilling, which is the reason I sadly won’t be repurchasing, it worked great quickening the skin renewal time and helping my acne scars fade. I would recommend this product to anyone who struggle with acne scaring and want a cheap yet effective product

Adding this to my regimen was a game changer. I only add it to my t zone for sebum control. One drop on my forehead and one on my chin and spread throughout. Too much product and you’ll get pilling and white cast. Less is more here. Do not add to dry areas or it will further dry them out. I’ve also noticed that even when I do have acne flare ups, adding this and alpha arbutin has drastically shortened the time it lasts. MASKNE miracle

Results.ReviewText:
This product has single handedly saved my skin.
BEWARE!!! This product WILL purge your skin, you will have a pretty horrific breakout when you first start using this but stick with it!! It truly helps your skins recovery and ESPECIALLY helps with acne and redness. I have very large pores, acne, redness and overall texture but this product significantly improved my skin. I cannot live without it in my routine. I now have the clearest skin of my life and I can confidently go out not having to wear makeup. 
PLEASE give this a shot if you suffer with acne.

My routine: Salicylic Acne Cleanser (The Inkey List), Niacinamide serum (The Ordinary), Hyaluronic Acid serum (also The Ordinary), any water based gel moisturizer (I am using Neutrogena. I also use Belif Aqua Bomb Sleeping Mask for extra hydration.

Results.Title: Very effective in short amount of time

Results.ReviewText:
I had this talked up to me by almost everyone as the holy grail of skincare for oily, acne prone skin. I heard all kinds of stuff about how prolonged use would make oily skin less oily, get rid of blemishes, and help with hyperpigmentation. I have skin so oily that I need to use medication to deal with it, so I was looking for any answer I could get. I knew I shouldn't have believed the hype.

The first bottle of this I got was cloudy, and it reeked. When I patch tested it, it made my skin break out. I threw it out and didn't bother again for a long time. When I gave it a second chance, the stuff was clear and smelled fine. Patch testing on one spot didn't hurt, but when I put it on for real, my whole face broke out.

I know you need to actually give new product time to work, or that your skin needs to purge, so I kept using it and my acne got progressively worse. I ultimately gave up on it, and as soon as I stopped using it, boom, my skin cleared up. I'll never be buying this stuff again.

Don't believe the hype! Try it if you want, but be ready for a potential disaster like the one I had. If you have oily, acne prone skin, I recommend The Ordinary's azelaic acid suspension instead.

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: I received this product as a free sample

I've been putting this on my nose in the evening almost every day for about two months now and my skin is completely back to normal!

I used to stick an acne bandage on one side of my nose and it would be FULL of oil within a couple of hours and even on days where I got the flaking under control, there would still be red/purple skin discoloration. This stuff took care of all of it, even the discoloration. The skin in the middle of my face can also be extremely sensitive sometimes but I haven't had any stinging or adverse reactions.

Results.Title: Wonderful Product For The Price!

Results.ReviewText:
This product/brand has rescued my skin from disaster. I have oily skin and have always put very minimal product on my skin. I am in my late 20s and I never suffered from acne until 2020. Wearing a mask every day made my cheeks, chin, and neck break out like crazy. After doing some research, I discovered niacinamide is a good ingredient for acne and decided to try this product. It was like magic! Not only did it clear up my breakouts, it also reduced redness and hyperpigmentation. It has been 6 weeks and my skin is almost back to normal. I also started using The Ordinary retinol at night which also helps with the discoloration. I cannot believe how great this worked for my skin. I thought I was doomed forever. 

Keep in mind: these products are great for oily skin type. My sister has dry skin and uses them only a couple times a week while I use them every day. I would recommend doing research first and getting familiar with your skin type. I never used strong products because I thought I had sensitive skin. I didn’t realize oily skin types benefit from products like this. There is a lot of helpful and informative information out there. I put in the time and learned a lot! I recommend at least trying this product because it is much more affordable than other options. If you don’t end up liking it, you didn’t lose out on much money.

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: I received this product as a free sample

Results.Title: A must try

Results.ReviewText:
I have surrendered to the fact that niacinamide products give me severe acne... I don't know a lot about skincare, but I know this is a holy grail product for many and was very excited to use it. 
I have tried using this product (as well as a niacinamide night cream) on and off for 6 months, and without fail, every time I use it (or the cream), I wake up with deep, under the skin acne in places that I have never had pimples before. I see the benefit of it on parts of my skin, but I can't stand the painful acne it gives me. Not for my skin, for whatever reason!

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: I received this product as a free sample

Results.Title: Gives me acne...

Results.ReviewText: I have very fair skin and have suffered with terrible acne and hyper-pigmentation my whole life. Even when I don't have breakouts, I have horrid acne marks for the next month from past acne. This is a GAME CHANGER! Using it every day took out the red marks from my face and really accelerated post acne inflammation. Truly changed my confidence!

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: I received this product as a free sample

Results.Title: Zapped Away my Terrible Red Acne Marks!

Results.ReviewText: I highly recommend this product! I have very dry skin and for my age I would say I still get a lot of pimples/acne every since I have used this product I can say it has truly helped my skin immensely. I do not have as many breakouts and when I do they are gone quickly after. It’s taken me years to find some kinds solution and I’m happy to say this is an excellent choice ! Thank you for making this wonderful product

Results.Title: BEST PRODUCT EVER

Results.ReviewText: This is truly a life saving little bottle. I have been struggling with acne for years and this addition has made life so much easier. I am on tret. as well, so need to be careful in terms of dryness, but so long as I lather on a moisturizer I’m fine. I recently went from using this once to twice a day and even in winter it is not over-drying. It is working both at keeping my acne at bay (minimizing pores and preventing breakouts) but also seems to be helping my hyperpigmented scars heal up as well. Love love love.

Results.ReviewText: I have dealt with break outs since about 11 or 12 years old. My face has ALWAYS been super oily. Only a few minutes after I would wash my face I would be covered in oil again. It was a huge embarrassment and really hurt my self esteem. On a whim I discovered The Ordinary Niacinamide and decided to give it a try because of all the rave reviews. My skin definitely purged a bit in the beginning, but I pushed through and the results have been so worth it! My oil production is under control, FINALLY. I have less break outs (still get hormonal breakouts) and for the first time in my life I am confident enough to go out anywhere with little to no make up! This is a must have in my skin care routine now.

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: I received this product as a free sample

Results.Title: Oil control!

Results.ReviewText: Its working gradually. I can observe slight results after a week use. My acne scars are reducing it also dried out an active acne on my face. Though i use it in combination with glycolic acid. would keep using it further to notice more results.

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: I received this product as a free sample

Results.ReviewText: I know I put 2 stars but read this... I tried this on my face yesterday and after it dries on my face it becomes all white and dry on my face like everywhere I put it becomes white. It only does not turn white it gets patchy.  Whenever I put it on now I gotta mix some kind of lotion with it that way it don’t turn white. I only recommend if you want your face all white and patchy.

Results.ReviewText: This product SAVED my skin. Had pretty good skin up until 23 and battled with random bad breakouts for 2 years. I’ve been using this for about 2 months now, and let me tell you... it has done WONDERS. My face doesn’t get oily throughout the day anymore, my pores have gotten significantly smaller, helped get rid of my bad breakout (especially my hormonal breakouts in my neck), and is helping so much with scarring. Try it.

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: I received this product as a free sample

Results.Title: WHATEVER THIS STUFF IS... YOU NEED IT.

Results.ReviewText:
I don't use this everywhere, however I have found it great for getting rid of pimples or blemishes overnight! I use the smallest amount on the affected area, and then the ordinary moisturizer over top. 

Word to the wise: it only works if you use moisturizer after applying. Otherwise it dries out on your skin and becomes almost flakey. I only use this at night and just run my hands over my face first to feel for any pimples that might be coming through. Every morning I wake up with my pimples gone or at least greatly reduced!

I would not recommend this to be applied all over the face if you have dry skin though.

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: I received this product as a free sample

The only thing I have to say is it did burn my face for the first few times I used it and the first time it did make my skin red for about a half hour. My skin has built tolerance now and it no longer burns and my face doesn’t go red. So it is strong and I only use it at night.

Results.Title: GETS RID OF ACNE SCARS

Results.ReviewText: i’ve been using this product for about half a year now and i’ve noticed a significant difference (almost immediately) with by oil production. since using this product my skin type has been on the normal side vs. it’s usual excessively oily. i’ve also noticed a significant decrease in the visibility of my pores on my cheek areas, so it’s given my skin an almost blurred effect. as far as acne scarring goes i haven’t noticed any benefits but i do think it helps pimples heal better & reduces further scarring. this is essential to my skincare routine and i use it twice a day, adding a lil extra to concerning areas or active pimples. def worth a try for the price!

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: I received this product as a free sample
